name: Give me My Artefact
description:
This is a simple network tag game, the seeker player(Blue) must capture the runner player(Red), before the timer runs out.

Credits:

GAME DESIGN

André Prado, Gerrit B. de Werk

LEVEL DESIGN

André Prado

GAME CODING

André Prado

ART DESIGN

Gerrit B. de Werk

GAME ENGINE

Unity engine 2020.1.13f1 LTS

NETWORK API

Photon Pun 2 v2.39
